mapper.insert: insert into bang (version, type, source, creact_time, id, name, num, statu) values (#{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{source,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creactTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{statu,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
